vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.9.7;
son of: Haman (H2001);
brother of: Dalphon (H1813), Aspatha (H0630), Poratha (H6334), Adalia (H0118), Aridatha (H0743), Parmashta (H6534), Arisai (H0747), Aridai (H0742) and Vaizatha (H2055)
§ Parshandatha = "given by prayer"
one of the 10 sons of Haman the enemy of Mordecai and queen Esther
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴珊大他 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "因禱告而得到的"
哈曼的十個兒子之一, 哈曼是末底改和以斯帖王后的敵人{#斯 9:7|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴珊大他 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "因祷告而得到的"
哈曼的十个儿子之一, 哈曼是末底改和以斯帖王后的敌人{#斯 9:7|}
